meanings.definition: to clean or wipe with a mop or cloth
meanings.sent1: She swobs the floor every morning.
meanings.sent2: I need to swobs the spill before it stains.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided to swobs its paws on the freshly mopped floor.
meanings.sent4: Her determination to swobs away the dirt of the past was admirable.
meanings.sent5: With a swift swobs, the mess was gone in an instant.

meanings.sent1: The janitor grabbed the swobs to clean the hallway.
